name: 20 Minute Chickpea Curry Recipe
description: This is the best and easiest Chickpea Curry, made in 20 minutes! Creamy, flavor packed and full of plant protein, this will become one of your go-to dinners when you barely have time to cook. The perfect weeknight dinner plus it's budget friendly!

video.name: Chickpea Curry
video.description: This is the best and easiest Chickpea Curry, made in 20 minutes! Creamy, flavor packed and full of plant protein, this will become one of your go-to dinners when you barely have time to cook.

recipeIngredient: 14 ounce can full fat coconut milk
15 ounce can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1/4 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
3/4 cup cherry tomatoes, sliced in half
2 cups baby spinach, sliced into ribbons or thrown in whole
4 cups cooked brown or white rice

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and sauté for 5 minutes.  Add the garlic and curry paste and stir, cooking for 1-2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and sauté for 5 minutes.  Add the garlic and curry paste and stir, cooking for 1-2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the coconut milk and chickpeas. Bring to a boil, then simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the lime juice, salt to taste, sugar, tomatoes, spinach and chopped basil. Cook for a minute until the spinach has wilted.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the coconut milk and chickpeas. Bring to a boil, then simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the lime juice, salt to taste, sugar, tomatoes, spinach and chopped basil. Cook for a minute until the spinach has wilted.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with rice and/or Easy Vegan Naan. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro and serve with lime wedges. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with rice and/or Easy Vegan Naan. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro and serve with lime wedges. Enjoy!

keywords: chickpea curry, coconut chickpea curry, vegan chickpea curry
